title: How to download free books - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to amazon website and search for free e books. Click on buy now on the book of your choice (Priced $0.00). It takes you to the screen asking for your login and password, if you do not have an account you may create one for free. The next screen suggests that you continue to deliver it to your kindle device or on your amazon cloud account, click on it. That is it! your book will be delivered to your kindle cloud account. The downloads doesn’t take up any space on your PC. Google ‘read.amazon.in’ from either your phone or PC or Laptop to read your book from amazon cloud reader for free anytime anywhere.
You can do it many different ways. By googling free books or free pdfs {insert books title}, or by going to amazon and looking in the free section.
